name: react-query
description: Hooks for managing, caching and syncing asynchronous and remote data in React
author: tannerlinsley

scripts.test:dev: npm run test:types && npm run test:eslint && jest --watch
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:types && npm run test:eslint && jest
scripts.build: yarn build:commonjs && yarn build:es && yarn build:umd && yarn build:types
scripts.build:umd: rimraf ./dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c && rollup-plugin-visualizer stats-react.json
scripts.build:types: rimraf ./types && tsc --project ./tsconfig.types.json && replace 'import type' 'import' ./types -r --silent && replace 'export type' 'export' ./types -r --silent
scripts.watch: yarn watch:commonjs & yarn watch:es & yarn watch:umd & yarn watch:types
scripts.watch:umd: rimraf ./dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -w -c && rollup-plugin-visualizer stats-react.json
scripts.watch:types: rimraf ./types && tsc --watch --project ./tsconfig.types.json && replace 'import type' 'import' ./types -r --silent && replace 'export type' 'export' ./types -r --silent
scripts.now-build: yarn && cd www && yarn && yarn build
